synopsis.text: Cultivation battles of ancient times were marked by the relentless pursuit of supremacy. A young man, dismissed as a 'Slumbering Deity,' stumbles upon an extraordinary cultivation technique, a divine boon disguised as mundane. This fortuitous encounter sets him on an unparalleled journey, transforming him into a prodigy with unrivaled physical prowess. As he ascends, his sword cleaves the stars, and countless gifted cultivators quiver in his formidable presence. In a world teeming with burgeoning heroes, he remains the sole, undisputed dominator.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
